SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.service

Interface TheatreService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TheatreServiceImpl
public interface TheatreService
Service interface responsible for managing theaters in the movie booking system. Offers methods for creating, retrieving, and querying theaters based on different criteria.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TheatreResponse
    createTheatre(TheatreRequest theatreRequest)
    Creates a new theater based on the provided theater details.
    List<TheatreResponse>
    getAllTheatreByTheatreCity(String theatreCity)
    Retrieves a list of theaters in a specific city.
    List<TheatreResponse>
    getAllTheatreByTheatreCity(String theatreCity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Retrieves a paginated list of theaters in a specific city.
    List<TheatreResponse>
    getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName(String theatreCity, String theatreName)
    Retrieves a list of theaters by city and theater name.
    List<TheatreResponse>
    getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName(String theatreCity, String theatreName, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Retrieves a paginated list of theaters by city and theater name.
    TheatreResponse
    getTheatreByTheatreId(String theatreId)
    Retrieves a specific theater based on the theater ID.

  • Method Details

    • createTheatre

      TheatreResponse createTheatre(TheatreRequest theatreRequest)
      Creates a new theater based on the provided theater details.
      Parameters:
      theatreRequest - The request containing details to create a theater.
      Returns:
      The created theater.

    • getAllTheatreByTheatreCity

      List<TheatreResponse> getAllTheatreByTheatreCity(String theatreCity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of theaters in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      theatreCity - The city for which theaters need to be retrieved.
      pageable - Pagination information.
      Returns:
      A paginated list of theater responses for the provided city.

    • getAllTheatreByTheatreCity

      List<TheatreResponse> getAllTheatreByTheatreCity(String theatreCity)
      Retrieves a list of theaters in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      theatreCity - The city for which theaters need to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of theater responses for the provided city.

    • getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName

      List<TheatreResponse> getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName(String theatreCity, String theatreName, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of theaters by city and theater name.
      Parameters:
      theatreCity - The city for which theaters need to be retrieved.
      theatreName - The name of the theater being searched.
      pageable - Pagination information.
      Returns:
      A paginated list of theater responses for the provided city and theater name.

    • getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName

      List<TheatreResponse> getAllTheatreByTheatreCityAndTheatreName(String theatreCity, String theatreName)
      Retrieves a list of theaters by city and theater name.
      Parameters:
      theatreCity - The city for which theaters need to be retrieved.
      theatreName - The name of the theater being searched.
      Returns:
      A list of theater responses for the provided city and theater name.

    • getTheatreByTheatreId

      TheatreResponse getTheatreByTheatreId(String theatreId)
      Retrieves a specific theater based on the theater ID.
      Parameters:
      theatreId - The ID of the theater to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The theater response corresponding to the provided theater ID.
